# function: region_from_id

Given an ID string value, returns the region contained in the ID.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
region_from_id(id string, skip_region_validation bool) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `id` (String) id to extract the region from
1. `skip_region_validation` (Boolean, Nullable) If true, will skip region validation with the region known by the Scaleway SDK.
